HiddenText.Name: CE evening school Q15
HiddenText.OpenningText: How do I obtain a NetID and a BYU-Idaho email account?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: A NetID may be obtained online at my.byui.edu. Once there, click "Forgot Password/Net ID, Don't have a Net ID, or can't login?". Follow the instructions provided toÂ obtain a NetID. To set up a BYU-Idaho e-mail account, or for any other related questions, call the McKay Library Computer Help Desk at (208) 496-9000.
